title: Send or revoke a TTO video linking request

headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Access token authorized by a TikTok One Creator Marketplace account. For details, see Authentication .

headers.name: Content-Type
headers.description: Request message type. Allowed format: application/json .

parameters.name: tto_tcm_account_id
parameters.description: The ID of the TikTok One Creator Marketplace account. To obtain the IDs of the accounts that you can access via Access-Token , use /tto/oauth2/tcm/ .

parameters.name: campaign_id
parameters.description: The ID of an existing TTO Creator Marketplace campaign. To obtain a list of TTO Creator Marketplace campaigns, use /tto/tcm/campaign/ .

parameters.name: video_id
parameters.description: The ID of a creator's public video to be linked to the campaign. To obtain a list of creator videos, use /tcm/creator/authorized/video/list/ . Note : Videos that have been linked to any other TikTok Creator Marketplace campaigns or TTO Creator Marketplace campaigns are not supported. The creator of the video needs to have been invited to the campaign.

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: Action to be taken. Enum values: LINK : Send a request to the creator for linking the video to the campaign. If such a request has been sent, the system will send a reminder notification to the creator. After you send a linking request, you need to wait for 24 hours to send a reminder notification. Otherwise, an error will occur. You can send up to two reminder notifications for a linking request. REVOKE : Revoke a linking request. You can only use this value when the creator has not accepted or rejected the request. You can only revoke each linking request once.

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: Response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix-Return Code .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: Response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: request_id
top_fields.description: The log ID of a request, which uniquely identifies the request.

fields.name: video_id
fields.description: The ID of the creator video to be linked to the campaign.

fields.name: status
fields.description: The status of the request. Enum values: IN_REVIEW : Sent to the creator and pending the creator's acceptance or rejection. REVOKE : Revoked.

fields.name: last_reminded_timestamp
fields.description: The last time when the linking request or the reminder notification was sent to the creator, in ISO-8601 format. Example: 2025-01-01T00:00:01Z .

fields.name: number_of_requests
fields.description: The number of linking requests that you have sent for the video. Example: 1.

fields.name: campaign_type
fields.description: The type of the TTO Creator Marketplace campaign. Enum values: CAMPAIGN : A campaign with a campaign-level invite link . BRAND_LINK : A campaign with a brand-level invite link .
